content: उदग्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्गतमग्रं यस्य] {@--1@} With elevated top, projecting, pointing upwards; as in °दंत. {@--2@} Tall, lofty, high, elevated, exalted (<ab>fig.</ab> also); उदग्रदशनांशुभिः <ls>Śi. 2. 21</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">4. 19</ls>; उदग्रः क्षत्रस्य शब्दः <ls>R. 2. 53</ls>; उदग्रप्लुतत्वात् <ls>Ś. 1. 7</ls> high leaps; <ls>Śi. 12. 65</ls>; °ग्रावन् <ls>Dk. 6</ls>; विक्रमोदग्रं शिरः <ls>R. 15. 27</ls> exalted; गंधोदग्रं पुष्पं <ls n="R.">16. 87</ls> rich in odour. {@--3@} Large, broad, vast, big; अवंतिनाथोयमुदग्रबाहुः <ls>R. 6. 32</ls>; <ls>Mu. 6. 12.</ls> {@--4@} Noble, good-looking (उदार); <ls>Ki. 14. 41.</ls> {@--5@} Advanced in age. {@--6@} Conspicuous, distinguished, exalted, magnified, increased; स मंगलोदग्रतरप्रभावः <ls>R. 2. 71</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 64</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 50.</ls> {@--7@} Intense, unbearable (as heat); <ls>Śi. 4. 12.</ls> {@--8@} Fierce, fearful; संदधे दृशमुदग्रतारकां <ls>R. 11. 69.</ls> {@--9@} Excited, furious, enraptured; मदोदग्राः ककुद्मंतः <ls>R. 4. 22.</ls> {@--10@} Mighty, strong; <ls>Ki. 18. 1</ls>; वेगोदग्रं विषं <ls>V. 5. 18</ls> strong or sharp (deadly).
